channel.title: Looking for a Development Team - 718
channel.description: Well let me start off saying, that I don't have the best experience. All that I've learned was from meddling around on my 667, and 718 servers. I know the basics, and I admit that, but that's never enough. I'm more of a hands on person, I like to learn things as I go. If you'd like to join me please list your experience below. The source is going to be Ben's Project, and in the future hopefully be hosted. Thanks for reading :)

item.title: Looking for a Development Team - 718
item.dc:creator: @haloking0697 haloking0697
item.description:
@haloking0697 wrote:

As same as you guys, I don’t have all the best knowledge in developing servers…but I do have decent Java Skills, such as I took a class last year for Computer Programming and learned alot, such as Arrays, Integers, Strings, if statements, cases, and many more…all I gotta do is learn how to apply that to the runescape private server in which I need to code! Which is basicly just knowing where everything is and how it all works, like I need a branch of what all the little parts connect to in order for the server to start.

If you’d like to talk, here’s my Skype: michael_the_shorty
If you do not use skype, then just reply here I guess.

Read full topic

item.title: Looking for a Development Team - 718
item.dc:creator: @zeropointx zeropointx
item.description:
@zeropointx wrote:

I am intrested in coding 718 as well as 317. Like you I don’t have too much knowledge at the moment. However I know and understand basic java stuff. I am also handling minecraft server at the moment so I might be able to host that as well (at least in the beginning).

Read full topic
